solution_line_template: The driver travels ({hours_first_leg} hours * {mph_first_leg} mph) + ({mph_second_leg} mph * {hours_second_leg} hours) = <<({hours_first_leg}*{mph_first_leg})+({mph_second_leg}*{hours_second_leg})={miles_per_day}>>{miles_per_day} miles per day
From Monday to Saturday he travels in total {miles_per_day} miles/day * {days_per_week} days = <<{miles_per_day}*{days_per_week}={miles_per_week}>>1,140 miles in a week
